posts.post_content:
Edit: No longer for sale, consigned to the next Love of the Game auction.

Tough to find card pasted on a schedule.  The cut out version of the card is more common but still very tough and desirable.  This is the way it was issued.


(T206 is for size comparison)


[IMG]https://baseballcardresource.com/forsale/19th_Century/1888_ConlyStudios_Clarkson_A.jpg[/IMG][IMG]https://baseballcardresource.com/forsale/19th_Century/1888_ConlyStudios_Clarkson_B.jpg[/IMG]
[IMG]https://baseballcardresource.com/forsale/19th_Century/1888_ConlyStudios_Clarkson_C.jpg[/IMG]
[IMG]https://baseballcardresource.com/forsale/19th_Century/1888_ConlyStudios_Clarkson_D.jpg[/IMG]
I almost pulled the trigger. This is going to do great in LOTG! Good luck!
